title: Regarding Valiant Sword Riven's splash art...
body:
The splash art looks great'n all but I dunno, I kinda thought she would be more athletic/fit like her physique in the Awaken music video than straight up slim like "all the other girls" in League.

Is it just me??

[Splash Art from Surr@20](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ziwRYR_AESs/XXqbnJILMYI/AAAAAAABYj0/NTkalNyMDY8tRD1CvWlKW3teQQ81KNp0gCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/92020.jpg)

{{champion:92}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:92}}

replies.body:
She looks very similar to {{champion:39}} and {{champion:114}}in that splash art. She doesn't have to be swole like {{champion:420}}, but a slightly more muscular tone would help her stand out more.

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ziwRYR_AESs/XXqbnJILMYI/AAAAAAABYj0/NTkalNyMDY8tRD1CvWlKW3teQQ81KNp0gCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/92020.jpg

Unfortunately the extent of her having muscles stops at "her deltoids are visible".

And honestly I immediately thought back to firecracker Vayne because of just how similarly they went about making her sexy. 

> https://cdn.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/EyaJVyFwLcozcznWujU2_u4kNJo=/0x0:1199x692/1200x800/filters:focal(664x53:854x243)/cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_image/image/62809647/DwaIsnhWwAAE_qu.0.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=7NiXmgz1,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2019-09-13T00:40:51.833+0000)
>
> Unfortunately the extent of her having muscles stops at "her deltoids are visible".
> 
> And honestly I immediately thought back to firecracker Vayne because of just how similarly they went about making her sexy.

And a frighteningly good job they did of it, too.
Right. I understand Immortal Journey skins are supposed to be more "Asian", but yeah, just a bit of differentiation would improve the splash, especially since her face is altered from her usual face.

I agree, but more than that, the strange I feel is in other part of muscles.
I think Riven is a little bit petite like an anime character, rather than tall and smart and mature like {{champion:114}}  {{champion:39}} .
Besides, if Riven depicted in this splash becomes muscular, she will become like this{{champion:420}} ...

> [{quoted}](name=tamaya,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=7NiXmgz1,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2019-09-13T10:06:08.181+0000)
>
> I agree, but more than that, the strange I feel is in other part of it.
> I think Riven is a little bit petite like an anime character, rather than tall and smart and mature like {{champion:114}}  {{champion:39}} .
> Besides, if the tall Riven becomes muscular, she will become like this{{champion:420}} ...

Issue is, both the tall, smart, mature and elegant physiques of Irelia and Fiora are both covered by their clothing.
And Riven is absolutely in no way a petite anime character; that's why I referenced the Awaken music video. She's very clearly a fit athletic toned build. Illaoi isn't call and muscular, she's quite thickset which is quite a departure from just "tall and muscular".

I think the physique of Awaken music video fits her character.
I am not saying that she is a loli and small like an anime character.
However, I think that it would be too strong if she becomes more muscular in this mature impression.

I'm sorry, I don't understand the subtle nuances of English because my native language is not English
And one more, "all the other girls" is definitely more popular in the league. How about the female champion you use?

> [{quoted}](name=tamaya,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=7NiXmgz1,comment-id=0000000200000000,timestamp=2019-09-13T10:36:19.200+0000)
>
>
> And one more, "all the other girls" is definitely more popular in the league. How about the female champion you use?

When I say "all the other girls", I'd be generalizing towards champions like Lux, Ashe, Caitlyn, LeBlanc, Syndra etc. are all slim/slender and as far as I know, none of them have as much of an athletic, fit physique compared to Riven.

Please stop the bitching about her body type. You're obviously not artists or designers. There is something dull about working on a motive where you don't have artistic freedom. Of course this is used to sell a female skin! But the muscles on the male artworks / models are overkill aswell. And noone is bitching about that. Just... goddamit stop this discussion this seriously annoyes me. I look at this splashart and I enjoy "THE ART" not what her body type is or what moral or sales influence hides behind it. I am even inclined to buy this skin just for the sake of the artwork (you bet your butt I'm downloading this wallpaper). I also want to add, I suck at league and at Riven. But I don't care :-)

> [{quoted}](name=Narthîl,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=7NiXmgz1,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-09-23T08:21:31.242+0000)
>
> Please stop the bitching about her body type...But the muscles on the male artworks / models are overkill aswell. And noone is bitching about that. Just... goddamit stop this discussion this seriously annoyes me.

This seems like your own personal issue man
Who are you to tell us what others should/shouldn't discuss
You're saying this all high and mighty like your mood should dictate what others want to discuss
If you don't like this discussion just ignore it. It's like other people like Pepsi, you hate Pepsi, so you take a can of Pepsi and drink it while shouting to everyone "I HATE PEPSI I HATE PEPSI"

But I know that most people who say "Riven should be more muscular!" don't like Riven very much.
Because people think "I want my waifu to be more beautiful than other women".
You are trying to make up a reason to slim down the female champions you play, right?

Your logic devolves per sentence it's absolutely astonishing..
I like it honestly and I am glad that Riots art department has stepped up their game so beautifully!
